languages.text: Стены мостика, силуэты команды и священные машины подрагивают и вытягиваются, словно гуттаперчевые фигуры. Со всех палуб поступают сообщения о неисправных когитаторах, обезумевших хронографах и неописуемых галлюцинациях, овладевших командой. Пока техножрецы пытаются умилостивить машинных духов, кормчий Равор передает — дела плохи. Навигационные системы с трудом поддаются управлению, а невидимая сила лишь крепнет и ускоряется, неумолимо подтягивая судно к своему темному чреву. Времени мало, и Лорд-капитану необходимо решить — покинуть опасное место или же поддаться силам и изучить аномалию изнутри.

traits.locale_text: Стены мостика, силуэты команды и священные машины подрагивают и вытягиваются перед вашими глазами, словно гуттаперчевые фигуры. Со всех палуб поступают сообщения о неисправных когитаторах, обезумевших хронографах и неописуемых галлюцинациях, овладевших командой. Пока техножрецы пытаются умилостивить машинных духов, кормчий Равор передает — дела плохи. Навигационные системы с трудом поддаются управлению, а невидимая сила лишь крепнет и ускоряется, быстрее подтягивая судно к своему темному чреву. Времени мало, и Лорд-капитану необходимо решить — покинуть опасное место или же поддаться силам и изучить аномалию изнутри.

languages.text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.
languages.original_text: Стены мостика, силуэты команды и священные машины подрагивают и вытягиваются, словно гуттаперчевые фигуры. traits.locale_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out before your eyes like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

languages.text: 舰桥的墙壁、船员的身影，以及船上的神圣机器颤抖着，像橡皮筋一样伸展开来。每层甲板上都传来了沉思者故障和计时码表的疯狂报警。还有一些报告称，船员们出现了难以形容的幻觉。当技术神甫试图安抚机魂时，舵手长雷沃发来报告，说情况很糟糕，导航系统几乎不起作用，而不可见的力量越来越强，越来越快，不断地要把船拖进它黑暗的胸膛。时间不多了，领主舰长必须做出决定，要么离开这个危险的地方，要么任由这股力量摆布，试图从内部研究这种异常现象。
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥的墙壁、船员的身影，以及船上的神圣机器颤抖着，像橡皮筋一样伸展开来。每层甲板上都传来了沉思者故障和计时码表的疯狂报警。还有一些报告称，船员们出现了难以形容的幻觉。当技术神甫试图安抚机魂时，舵手长雷沃发来报告，说情况很糟糕，导航系统几乎不起作用，而不可见的力量越来越强，越来越快，不断地要把船拖进它黑暗的胸膛。时间不多了，领主舰长必须做出决定，要么离开这个危险的地方，要么任由这股力量摆布，试图从内部研究这种异常现象。

舰桥的墙壁、船员的身影，以及船上的神圣机器在你眼前颤抖着，像橡皮筋一样伸展开来。每层甲板上都传来了沉思者故障和计时码表的疯狂报警。还有一些报告称，船员们出现了难以形容的幻觉。当技术神甫试图安抚机魂时，舵手长雷沃发来报告，说情况很糟糕，导航系统几乎不起作用，而不可见的力量越来越强，越来越快，不断地要把船拖进它黑暗的胸膛。时间不多了，领主舰长必须做出决定，要么离开这个危险的地方，要么任由这股力量摆布，试图从内部研究这种异常现象。

languages.text: ブリッジの壁、クルーのシルエット、船の聖なる機械が、輪ゴムのように伸びる。各甲板から考算機の故障や狂ったクロノグラフの警告が入り、クルーを襲う言いようのない幻覚の報告も入る。技術司祭たちが機械精霊をなだめようとしている間、ヘルムスマンのラヴォアは酷い状況にあることを報告する。航行システムは、ほとんど機能しておらず、目に見えない力はますます強く、加速し、船は絶え間なくその暗い懐に引きずり込まれている。時間がない。ロード・キャプテンは、危険な場所を離れるか、力に屈して内部から異常を調査するか、決断しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

ブリッジの壁、クルーのシルエット、船の聖なる機械が、輪ゴムのように目の前で震え、伸びる。各甲板から考算機の故障や狂ったクロノグラフの警告が入り、クルーを襲う言いようのない幻覚の報告も入る。技術司祭たちが機械精霊をなだめようとしている間、ヘルムスマンのラヴォアは酷い状況にあることを報告する。航行システムは、ほとんど機能しておらず、目に見えない力はますます強く、加速し、船は絶え間なくその暗い懐に引きずり込まれている。時間がない。ロード・キャプテンは、危険な場所を離れるか、力に屈して内部から異常を調査するか、決断しなければならない。

languages.text: Las paredes del puente, las siluetas de la tripulación y las sagradas máquinas de la nave se estremecen y se estiran como gomas elásticas. De todas las cubiertas llegan alertas de cogitadores que fallan y cronógrafos enloquecidos, acompañadas de informes de alucinaciones que afectan a la tripulación. Mientras los tecnosacerdotes intentan apaciguar a los espíritus máquina, el maestro timonel Ravor informa de que la situación es insostenible. Los sistemas de navegación están al borde del colapso y la fuerza invisible se vuelve más rápida y fuerte, arrastrando la nave hacia su oscuro seno. No queda tiempo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe decidirse: abandonar este peligroso lugar o ceder ante la fuerza y estudiar la anomalía por dentro.
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

De todas las cubiertas llegan alertas de cogitadores que fallan y cronógrafos enloquecidos, acompañadas de informes de alucinaciones que afectan a la tripulación. Mientras los tecnosacerdotes intentan apaciguar a los espíritus máquina, el maestro timonel Ravor informa de que la situación es insostenible. Los sistemas de navegación están al borde del colapso y la fuerza invisible se vuelve más rápida y fuerte, arrastrando la nave hacia su oscuro seno. No queda tiempo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe decidirse: abandonar este peligroso lugar o ceder ante la fuerza y estudiar la anomalía por dentro.

languages.text: Die Wände der Brücke, die Silhouetten der Crew und die heiligen Maschinen des Schiffs erzittern und dehnen sich wie Gummibänder. Alarmsignale defekter Cogitatoren und durchdrehender Chronographen ertönen von allen Decks, genau wie Berichte über unbeschreibliche Halluzinationen, die die Crew heimsuchen. Während die Techpriester versuchen, die Maschinengeister zu besänftigen, berichtet Steuermann Ravor, dass die Lage ernst ist. Die Navigationssysteme funktionieren kaum mehr, und die unsichtbare Kraft wird immer stärker und schneller, sie zieht das Schiff unaufhörlich in das dunkle Loch hinein. Es bleibt nur wenig Zeit, und der Lord Captain muss entscheiden ... soll das Schiff diese gefährliche Anomalie verlassen oder der Kraft nachgeben und die Anomalie von innen studieren.
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

traits.locale_text: Die Wände der Brücke, die Silhouetten der Crew und die heiligen Maschinen des Schiffs erzittern und dehnen sich wie Gummibänder. Alarmsignale defekter Cogitatoren und durchdrehender Chronographen ertönen von allen Decks, genau wie Berichte über unbeschreibliche Halluzinationen, die die Crew heimsuchen. Während die Techpriester versuchen, die Maschinengeister zu besänftigen, berichtet Steuermann Ravor, dass die Lage ernst ist. Die Navigationssysteme funktionieren kaum mehr, und die unsichtbare Kraft wird immer stärker und schneller, sie zieht das Schiff unaufhörlich in das dunkle Loch hinein. Es bleibt nur wenig Zeit, und der Lord Captain muss entscheiden ... soll das Schiff diese gefährliche Anomalie verlassen oder der Kraft nachgeben und die Anomalie von innen studieren.

Die Wände der Brücke, die Silhouetten der Crew und die heiligen Maschinen des Schiffs erzittern und strecken sich vor deinen Augen aus wie Gummibänder. Alarmsignale defekter Cogitatoren und durchdrehender Chronographen ertönen von allen Decks, genau wie Berichte über unbeschreibliche Halluzinationen, welche die Crew heimsuchen. Während die Techpriester versuchen, die Maschinengeister zu besänftigen, berichtet Steuermann Ravor, dass die Lage ernst ist. Die Navigationssysteme funktionieren kaum mehr, und die unsichtbare Kraft wird immer stärker und schneller, sie zieht das Schiff unaufhörlich in das dunkle Loch hinein. Es bleibt nur wenig Zeit, und der Lord Captain muss entscheiden — soll das Schiff diese gefährliche Anomalie verlassen oder der Kraft nachgeben und die Anomalie von innen studieren.

languages.text: Les cloisons de la passerelle, les silhouettes de l'équipage et les machines sacrées du vaisseau vacillent et s'étirent tels des élastiques. Des alertes signalant des cogitateurs défaillants et des chronographes devenus fous vous parviennent de tous les ponts, de même que des rapports faisant état de cosmomarins souffrant d'hallucinations indescriptibles. Tandis que les technoprêtres s'efforcent de calmer les esprits de la machine, le maître timonier Ravor vous informe que la situation est grave. Les systèmes de navigation sont pour ainsi dire hors service et la force invisible gagne en puissance et en vitesse, happant irrémédiablement le vaisseau dans son giron ténébreux. Le temps presse et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit prendre une décision, quitter au plus vite cet endroit ô combien dangereux ou se laisser emporter afin d'étudier l'anomalie de l'intérieur.
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.

languages.text: Köprünün duvarları, mürettebatın silüetleri ve geminin kutsal makineleri, paket lastiği misali titreyip esniyor. Tüm güvertelerden hata veren kavramsayarlara ve deliye dönen kronograflara dair uyarıların yanı sıra mürettebatı etkisi altına alan, tarif edilemez halüsinasyonların raporları geliyor. Tekno Rahipler, makine ruhlarını yatıştırmaya çalışıyor. Bu sırada serdümen Ravor, durumun kötü olduğunu raporluyor. Rotacılık sistemleri, güç bela işlevini sürdürüyor. Görünmeyen güç, gittikçe daha da güçlenerek gemiyi karanlık merkezine çekiyor. Çok az bir zaman var ve Lord Kaptan'ın bir karar vermesi gerekiyor. Ya bu tehlikeli yerden ayrılmayı ya da güce boyun eğerek anomaliyi içeriden incelemeyi seçecek.
languages.original_text: The walls of the bridge, the crew's silhouettes, and the ship's holy machines tremble and stretch out like rubber bands. Alerts of malfunctioning cogitators and maddened chronographs come in from every deck, as do reports of indescribable hallucinations gripping the crew. While the Tech-Priests are trying to placate the machine spirits, helmsman Ravor reports that the situation is bad. Navigational systems are barely functional, and the invisible force is getting stronger and accelerating, ceaselessly dragging the vessel into its dark bosom. There is little time, and the Lord Captain must decide — leave the dangerous place or give in to the force and study the anomaly from within.
